definition: cloak that is folded or wrapped around a person, arrange or fold as a cover or protection
details:
noun
- cloak that is folded or wrapped around a person
= synonyms: wrapper
- the covering (usually paper or cellophane) in which something is wrapped
= synonyms: wrapper
- a sandwich in which the filling is rolled up in a soft tortilla
verb
- arrange or fold as a cover or protection
= example: arrange or fold as a cover or protection
= synonyms: wrap up
- arrange or or coil around
= synonyms: roll
- crash into so as to coil around
= example: crash into so as to coil around
- enclose or enfold completely with or as if with a covering
= synonyms: enclose, envelop, enfold, enwrap
